title: Pirelli widens P Zero Race & Road clincher road tires with evolved rubber, new casings
content:
It’s been four years since Pirelli returned to cycling with their P Zero road race tires. And now those original clinchers get many of the same tech updates that have popped up in the years since on pro tubulars, then road tubeless tires. Now those riding clinchers and inner tubes get the same upgrades to […]

The post Pirelli widens P Zero Race & Road clincher road tires with evolved rubber, new casings appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
